ComicInfo.Summary:
Now that Katie’s not only trapped in the 90s, she’s also stuck in the head of her alternate self!! Can the two Katie’s sync up enough to wield the Vampblades against the latest Glarkian space vampire threat??
Features 3 regular and risqué variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------|--------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Danielle Gransaull | 3 | | D | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Danielle Gransaull | 4 | | E | Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Brao | 5 | | F | Risqué Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Brao | 6 |
Note: Issue #41 in a series.
ComicInfo.Title: Back In Black Part Four
